\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	0 \& K \& P \& S \& 0 \\
	0 \& {M_\beta} \& {M_{\beta + 1}} \& S \& 0 \\
	{M_\alpha }
	\arrow[from=1-1, to=1-2]
	\arrow["i", from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow["{g'}", from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow["g"', curve={height=24pt}, from=1-2, to=3-1]
	\arrow["p", from=1-3, to=1-4]
	\arrow[dashed, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow[equals, from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow[from=2-1, to=2-2]
	\arrow["{f_\beta}"', from=2-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-2, to=3-1]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[curve={height=-12pt}, from=2-3, to=3-1]
	\arrow[from=2-4, to=2-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
